text: Panorama view of Riga seen from Pārdaugava side of the Daugava River. Vintage viewcard from the early 20th century. Pārdaugava is an area of Riga, composed of several neighbourhoods on the west bank of Daugava River. The name is literally translated as 'over Daugava'. Category:Neighbourhoods in Riga
title: Pārdaugava
